scenario.sendRequestSIP:
INVITE sip:alice@devoteam.com SIP/2.0 To: "alice" <sip:alice@devoteam.com>;tag=alice From: "bob" <sip:bob@devoteam.com>;tag=bob Call-ID: [CallId] CSeq: 1 INVITE Max-Forwards: 70 Route: <sip:alice@[RemoteAddress];transport=[transportRequest];lr> Route: <sip:alice@[localSIP];transport=[transportRequest];lr> Contact: <sip:bob@[localSIP]> Via: SIP/2.0/[transportResponse] [localSIP];branch=[BranchId] User-Agent: XmlLoader Content-Type: multipart/mixed;boundary="----=_Part_0" Content-Length: x
------=_Part_0 Content-Type: application/sdp
v=0 o=bob 999 999 IN IP4 172.16.21.23 s=- c=IN IP4 172.16.21.23 t=0 0 m=audio 10000 RTP/AVP 97 a=rtpmap:97 amr/8000/1 a=fmtp:97 mode-set=1;octet-align=1;crc=0 a=+g.poc.talkburst a=maxptime:200 a=ptime:200 m=application 10001 udp TBCP a=fmtp:TBCP queuing=0;tb_priority=1;timestamp=0
------=_Part_0 Content-Type: application/resource-lists+xml Content-Disposition: recipient-list
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <resource-lists xmlns="urn:ietf:params:xml:ns:resource-lists" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"> <list> <entry uri="alice"/> </list> </resource-lists> ------=_Part_0--

ACK sip:alice@devoteam.com SIP/2.0 To: "alice" <sip:alice@devoteam.com>;tag=alice From: "bob" <sip:bob@devoteam.com>;tag=bob Call-ID: [CallId] CSeq: 1 ACK Max-Forwards: 70 Route: <sip:alice@[remoteSIP];transport=[transportRequest];lr> Route: <sip:alice@[localSIP];transport=[transportRequest];lr> Contact: <sip:bob@[localSIP]> Via: SIP/2.0/[transportResponse] [localSIP];branch=[BranchId] User-Agent: XmlLoader Content-Length: 0

BYE sip:alice@devoteam.com SIP/2.0 To: "alice" <sip:alice@devoteam.com>;tag=alice From: "bob" <sip:bob@devoteam.com>;tag=bob Call-ID: [CallId] CSeq: 2 BYE Max-Forwards: 70 Route: <sip:alice@[remoteSIP];transport=[transportRequest];lr> Route: <sip:alice@[localSIP];transport=[transportRequest];lr> Contact: <sip:bob@[localSIP]> Via: SIP/2.0/[transportResponse] [localSIP];branch=[BranchId] User-Agent: XmlLoader Content-Length: 0
